author: MICHAEL TARM
title: EXPLAINER: `Willfulness' key to 2nd trial over Floyd killing
description: Prosecutors in the federal trial of three former Minneapolis police officers accused in George Floyd’s killing needed to convince jurors that the officers “willfully” deprived Floyd of his civil rights.
content: Prosecutors in the federal trial of three former Minneapolis police officers accused in George Floyd’s killing needed to convince jurors that the officers “willfully” deprived Floyd of his civil righ… [+6785 chars]
